subject: Mathematics
question_text: Molar mass of the salt from NaBr,   NaNO 3 ,   KI 2 which does not evolve coloured vapours on heating with concentrated H 2 SO 4 is ____ g   mol – 1 , (Molar mass in g   mol – 1 :   Na   :   23,   N   :   14,   K   :   39,   O   :   16,   Br   :   80,   I   :   127,   F   :   19,   Ca   :   40 )
